abdomen.small_bowel: Normal in caliber, no intraperitoneal free air, mesentery appears normal.

appendix.appendicolith: 1.1 cm in the tip of the appendix with surrounding inflammatory stranding.
appendix.fluid_collection: No drainable fluid collection or extraluminal gas.

findings.bone_windows: No concerning lytic or blastic osseous lesions.
